widget.name: BrassBadger Ammo Tracker
widget.description: BrassBadger attempts to keep track of local ammunition availability. Recent ammo shortages have made it difficult to find local supplies of ammunition. By tracking Wal-Mart's inventory, BrassBadger can show you up-to-date local stock status of all your favorite calibers. BrassBadger currently tracks the following: HANDGUN (.357 Magnum, .38 Special, .380 ACP, .40 SW, .44 Magnum, .45 Auto, .45 Colt, 9mm Luger), RIFLE (.22-250 Remington, .223 Remington, .243 Winchester, .270 Winchester, .30-06 Springfield, .30-30 Winchester, .308 Winchester, 5.56x45mm NATO, 6.8mm Remington SPC, 7.62x35mm/300BLK, 7.62x39mm), RIMFIRE (.17 HMR, .22 LR, .22 Magnum), and SHOTGUN (12 Gauge, 20 Gauge, .410 Bore). Tracking ammo availability is a complicated task. Many factors can affect the accuracy of BrassBadger. BrassBadger is not affiliated with Wal-Mart, and is limited to the accuracy of the information sources it pulls from. Remember to always be respectful to all store employees, associates, and shoppers.
widget.author: Taylor Honsowetz
